chapter.text: You clutch the back of your head, shutting your eyes tight. ^1500You feel lightheaded. ^1500While distracted by the pain, the monster pulls you out from under the desk as if you weigh nothing. ^1500You try to look at him, but you canâ€™t seem to focus through the dizziness. ^1500Before you get a chance to concentrate, the monster wraps the wires around your throat and pulls tight. ^1500As you fight for your last breaths, you drop you to the ground. ^1500The monster drags you out of the room behind it by the wires around your neck. ^1500Your vision goes dark.
